argumentsAndDecisions.complaintSummary: Landlord's failure to register unit and unlawful imposition of utility charges
argumentsAndDecisions.respondentHadNotice: Yes, tenant made complaints about utility charges
argumentsAndDecisions.evidenceAssessment: Hearing officer found landlord failed to properly register unit and unlawfully imposed utility charges
argumentsAndDecisions.impactAssessment: Tenant was charged above maximum lawful rent and forced to pay utilities that should have been included
